## Movie at Mayfair

We've rented out [Mayfair Theatre](https://mayfairtheatre.ca/) for all of you to come share a special movie with us! However, we don't yet know what that movie will be and we want your help... Check out our options [here](https://reiko-and-noah.github.io/Big-30/movies.html) and vote for your favorites in the RSVP!

Note that the concession stand will be open with snacks for purchase during this showing.

## Cake and Happy Hour

Afterwards, join us in continuing the celebration at [CRAFT Beer Market's](https://www.craftbeermarket.ca/locations/ottawa/) happy hour where will will also be serving cake!

**RSVP**: If you can make it, please RSVP at the [this link](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScZOcR5IDoAQDZji3swh5ML2eNgYFGZ8eiIlCtoLbZFMRaQ9w/viewform?usp=header) by **August 31st, 2025**. The specific details for our two events can be found in the RSVP!
